clinical_history: Follow-up ultrasound for known liver lesion.
technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Gallbladder shows hyperechoic, no stones or wall thickening.
Major vessels show hypoechoic waveform on Doppler.
Breast tissue shows enlarged lesion measuring 39.09 mm.
Left kidney shows mildly thickened, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Uterus appears mildly thickened; endometrial thickness measures 7.92 mm.
Soft tissue region demonstrates coarse without fluid collection.
Thyroid gland shows normal echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
